subject: Super Bowl
Music
Football
Rap and Hip-Hop
lead_paragraph: This was the season that hip-hop finally caught up to the N.F.L., something that happened weeks before the Black Eyed Peas took center stage at Cowboys Stadium.
snippet: This was the season that hip-hop finally caught up to the N.F.L., something that happened weeks before the Black Eyed Peas took center stage at Cowboys Stadium.
